sentences.en: A worker from Date Cosmos 21 comes to collect the waste oil.
sentences.cn: 一名工人从21日期宇宙来收集废油.

sentences.en: B: We actually know relatively little about space and the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 可能我们对空间和宇宙的了解只是非常有限的一点点.

sentences.en: God is not subjected to paramount immutable laws of the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 上帝并不受制于至上的,永恒的宇宙法则.

sentences.en: Grodius thereby grounded the natural law on an eternal reason pervading the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 据此,格劳休斯把自然法建立在一种遍及宇宙的永恒的理性的基础上.

sentences.en: I am willing to an Acacia beans for your entire cosmos.
sentences.cn: 我愿意以一颗红豆换你整个相思宇宙.

sentences.en: Is there any other intelligent life elsewhere in the cosmos?
sentences.cn: 在宇宙的其他星球上还存在别的有智慧的生物 吗 ?

sentences.en: Our world is but a small part of the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 我们的世界仅仅是宇宙的一小部分而已.

sentences.en: The imaging was part of a project called COSMOS — the Cosmic Evolution Survey.
sentences.cn: 也是COSMOS工程(宇宙发展研究)的一部分.

sentences.en: The Maya understood 17 different Calendars based on the Cosmos.
sentences.cn: 玛雅人明白到17种以宇宙为基础的不同历法.

sentences.en: The size and age of the Cosmos are beyond ordinary human understanding.
sentences.cn: 宇宙的范围和年龄超出了普通人们的理解.

sentences.en: There are still many things unknown about the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 关于宇宙,我们还有很多未知的东西.

sentences.en: There must be many planets like earth in the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 在宇宙中一定有许多像地球一样的星球.

sentences.en: These new discoveries have broken new ground in the exploration of the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 这些新的发现在宇宙探索方面开辟了新道路.

sentences.en: We're about to begin a journey through the Cosmos.
sentences.cn: 我们即将开始穿越宇宙的旅行.

words.tran_cn: 宇宙进化论；宇宙的产生，宇宙的起源
[天] 宇宙论，[天] 宇宙学

trans.tran_en: the whole universe, especially when you think of it as a system
